description.message: An easy-to-use tab reloader with custom reloading time for individual tabs and more!

popup_active.message: Do not reload if tab is active

popup_nofocus.message: Reload if window is not focused

popup_offline.message: Do not reload tab if offline

popup_discarded.message: Do not reload tab if discarded

popup_ste.message: Scroll to the end after reload

popup_switch.message: Switch to the tab if content changed

popup_bw.message: Do not reload if the address or title contains

popup_forced.message: Use Shift key to force periods less than 10 seconds

popup_variation_hint.message: Set variation in percent to randomize reloading time (applies after the first reload)

popup_enable_keys.message:
'S' key to enable reloading
'Escape' key to disable reloading
Shift + Escape key to close the popup
Ctrl/Command + 1/10 keys to select a preset

options_badge.message: Display the total number of active jobs in the badge area

options_pp_current.message: Default value for "Do no reload if tab is active"

options_pp_nofocus.message: Default value for "Reload if window is not focused"

options_pp_cache.message: Default value for "Use cache while reloading"

options_pp_offline.message: Default value for "Do not reload if offline"

options_pp_discarded.message: Default value for "Do not reload if discarded"

options_pp_nodiscard.message: Default value for "Prevent the tab from discarding"

options_pp_scroll_to_end.message: Default value for "Scroll to the end after reload"

options_json_desc.message: List hostnames in JSON format to set an automatic refresh after each startup. If you need URL matching instead of hostname matching, remove the "hostname" key and append the "url" key instead. Read the FAQs page for additional instructions.

options_dynamic_json.message: Always check to install reloading jobs from the JSON object when a new page loads.

options_dynamic_json_desc.message: When this option is enabled, the extension installs a new custom reloading job for new pages matching one of the keys in the list.

options_reassign.message: Try to assign a reloading job when a new tab used to have an active reloading job.

options_export_desc.message: Export: Export all settings to a JSON file and download it to the default download directory

options_import_desc.message: Import: Import settings from a JSON file (this will overwrite current settings and restarts the extension)

options_reset_desc.message: Reset: Reset settings to the factory values

bg_reload_window.message: All tabs in the current window

bg_reload_window_discarded.message: All discarded tabs in the current window
